channel.title: Posters
channel.description:
Does anyone know If Valve made a half life 2 poster? I have the episode 1 and 2 posters but I can find anywhere if they even made one for half life 2. I know theres a bunch on ebay but I want a valve made one.
Like this one. [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1298&stc=1&d=1332778893[/img] ![images.jpeg|194x259](upload://dCjIZKh6CBqRqkPj6Pc6N8ELdBT.jpeg)
